title: Our Top-Rated Meatloaf Recipes
description: If you think all meatloaf tastes the same, you're so wrong. Here are 15 top-rated meatloaf recipes you won't forget.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond 15 Top-Rated Meatloaf Recipes By Mary Claire Lagroue Mary Claire Lagroue Mary Claire Lagroue is the Commerce Editor at Food & Wine. A former associate editor at Allrecipes, she joined Dotdash Meredith in 2019. She has written about food since 2017, covering everything from product reviews to recipes to restaurants. Her work can be found in Cooking Light, Southern Living, and more.  Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on April 21, 2025 Close Credits: naples34102 If you think all meatloaf tastes the same, you're so wrong. Even classic ketchup-topped recipes vary from cheesy to herby to subtly sweet. Here are 15 top-rated meatloaf recipes you won't forget. 01 of 15 Glazed Meatloaf View Recipe Save miapark It's topped with a sweet-and-sour glaze made from lemon juice and mustard. 02 of 15 Tantalizingly Tangy Meatloaf View Recipe Save jsan The tangy trick? A small scoop of pineapple preserves. 03 of 15 Mini Meatloaves View Recipe Save KGora Kids will love having their own personal meatloaf. This recipe has oats to help stretch the meat and lower the calorie count. 04 of 15 Brown Sugar Meatloaf View Recipe Save Cooking Monster Bryan A little dash of ground ginger adds flavor to this basic meatloaf. 05 of 15 Rempel Family Meatloaf View Recipe Save cookin'mama Cheddar cheese mixed into the meat makes this meatloaf extra moist. 06 of 15 Turkey and Quinoa Meatloaf View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine "I always found turkey meatloaf to be quite disappointing. The flavor is usually lacking as well as the texture. Well, I have developed this version that has a great texture and a surprisingly good flavor. My brother couldn't even tell that it wasn't beef! The secret is the quinoa, which adds wonderful texture and is much nuttier than breadcrumbs," Andrew Benoit says. 07 of 15 Italian Style Turkey Meatloaf View Recipe Save Sugarplum Italian seasoning and seasoned bread crumbs give this meatloaf a Mediterranean flair. Chicken Parmesan Meatloaf 08 of 15 Classic Spicy Meatloaf View Recipe Save naples34102 Spicy ground pork sausage gives this version the perfect amount of heat. 09 of 15 Best Ever Meat Loaf View Recipe Save ALAN "This was absolutely the best meatloaf I have ever made, or had for that matter, in my life. I highly recommend it. The savory-sweet glaze is fantastic! My whole crew normally puts ketchup on everything. Not one of them reached for it," Donna says. "Amazing!" 10 of 15 A Firefighter's Meatloaf View Recipe Save Cookies Dijon mustard, salsa, and barbeque sauce pack plenty of flavor into this meatloaf. 11 of 15 Kid-Friendly Italian Turkey Meatloaf View Recipe Save fabeverydayblog "This is a delicious alternative to traditional meatloaf that tastes like meatballs and is very kid-friendly! Serve with pasta or mashed potatoes. You can also serve extra marinara on the side," Kathryn says. 12 of 15 Easy Meatloaf View Recipe Save This recipe lives up to its name. It calls for just 10 minutes of prep time. 13 of 15 Cheeseburger Meatloaf View Recipe Save If you're cooking for a meatloaf skeptic, look no further than this cheesy take. It really does taste like a cheeseburger! 14 of 15 Incredibly Cheesy Turkey Meatloaf View Recipe Save This easy, cheesy meatloaf boasts a rating of almost five stars from more close to 1,500 home cooks. 15 of 15 The Best Meatloaf View Recipe Save Allrecipes Steak sauce adds sweetness and tang, which complement hearty beef oh so well. Explore more: Recipes Main Dishes Meatloaf Recipes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
